title: Anyone have any gimics for when they play League?
body: I have this gimic where I can only play Blitzcrank if I'm using the Piltover Blitzcrank skin. I can't even perform well on plain Blitzcrank. This is why whenever I buy Blitzcrank on an account I have to buy that skin as well.

replies.body:
I usually don't win matches.
But when I don't I do.

5 tanks and they all build bruiser, or hell, all adc/apc build.

Have fun getting rekt tho.

it seemed a LARGE number of players felt the same way. udyr play rate went down quite a bit during the ultimate skin being disabled. it was quite funny, because for about 3 days after it was re-enabled i saw udyr bans, lots and lots of udyr bans.

in OCE? in silver?

lol its more they dont want the badyrs coming off not playing him for a week or 2 cos of the disabled skin.

badyrs....

ok how bout you just go neck yourself. you arent funny, stop trying to be.
cannot play velkoz without arclight because of the w outline
I can't play Quinn without Vowler, that's why the accounts I have Quinn on also has her woad scout skin.

Whenever I kill someone as Annie, I always do her taunt over their dead body. This has lead to some issues before... I should really get out of this habit.

Also, back when I was starting out with LoL, I would type into [all] chat "DEMACIA!!!" whenever I was about to gank someone or we did a good play as Garen
